LocaleResource.Name: SystemDesign.ImageUpload.Content
LocaleResource.Value: Please upload your completed landscape drawing and any supporting images, including pictures of all landscape areas where irrigation is to be installed. Ideally, landscape images will include faucet locations.

LocaleResource.Name: plugins.torchdesign.dynamicsgp.domaindescription
LocaleResource.Value: Please provide login informatrion for the web service. The provided account must be granted the proper permissions in th Dynamics Security Console on the Web Service Server.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.TorchDesign.DynamicsGP.Error.WebserviceAddress
LocaleResource.Value: Web service address is empty. please go to all setting find "torchdesignsdynamicsgpwcfsettings.webserviceaddress" setting and set it's value. or you can smiply uninstall and re-install plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.TorchDesign.DynamicsGP.Error.UserName
LocaleResource.Value: UserName is empty. please go to all setting find "torchdesignsdynamicsgpwcfsettings.username" setting and set it's value. or you can smiply uninstall and re-install plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.TorchDesign.DynamicsGP.Error.Password
LocaleResource.Value: Password is empty. please go to all setting find "torchdesignsdynamicsgpwcfsettings.password" setting and set it's value. or you can smiply uninstall and re-install plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.TorchDesign.DynamicsGP.Error.Domain
LocaleResource.Value: Domain is empty. please go to all setting find "torchdesignsdynamicsgpwcfsettings.domain" setting and set it's value. or you can smiply uninstall and re-install plugin.
